characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the beginning of your Movement phase, if Baharroth is not within 1" of an enemy model they can leap back into the skies. Remove this unit from the battlefield. They can return to the battlefield as described in the Cry of the Wind ability. This unit may not both Skyleap and descend on Swooping Hawk wings in the same turn. If the battle ends while Baharroth is in the skies, he is considered to be slain.
